data.name: connection
data.message:
Hello Gary Lawrence ‚Äî and welcome to your onboarding experience with eXp Realty.

I‚Äôm Luna, your private onboarding guide, here to walk you through this short application. It‚Äôs designed to help us understand your business and get you set up for success at eXp ‚Äî on your terms.

üîê Your information stays private and secure. This form is encrypted, and no data is shared outside of your onboarding team without your consent. Luna is here to assist, not store or share.

‚ö†Ô∏è Completing this application does not move your license. Once submitted, you‚Äôll receive personalized next steps based on your region and license type.

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll need:

‚Ä¢ Your real estate license details

‚Ä¢ Your sponsor‚Äôs name (don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôll help if you‚Äôre unsure)

‚Ä¢ Direct deposit banking info

‚Ä¢ A payment method for the onboarding fee

‚Ä¢ MLS membership info (if applicable)

‚úÖ You can review and edit all answers before submitting.

We‚Äôre excited to support you ‚Äî at your pace, in your style ‚Äî and help you activate faster than any brokerage on the planet.

fields.label: Your Sponsor Selection Is Permanent ‚Äî Choose Thoughtfully
Your sponsor is the person who most influenced your decision to join eXp Realty. This selection is final once you sign your Independent Contractor Agreement (ICA) ‚Äî it cannot be changed later.

üß≠ Quick Clarification:

Your sponsor is not always your mentor, coach, or team leader ‚Äî unless they were the primary influence behind your decision to join.
If you're unsure, now is the time to pause and confirm. Once submitted, this cannot be edited.

ü§ù Why It Matters:

Your sponsor becomes your connection point into eXp. While they may offer support or introductions, their role is symbolic ‚Äî not managerial or operational. Choosing based on who truly influenced your journey ensures alignment and transparency.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è Watch the short video below for a quick walkthrough before making your selection.
Please click on the button below to acknowledge you‚Äôve watched and understood the video.

data.name: plutoPaymentPayload
data.message:
**Next, we‚Äôll set up your payment method.**

This is for your initial onboarding fee and future monthly fees associated with your eXp account.

üîí Your info is **encrypted and securely processed through Payload**, our trusted payment provider.

**You'll be charged once your application is approved** ‚Äî not before. (you have to put in a bank account and card and set default method).

Here‚Äôs what to expect:

‚Ä¢ **Onboarding Fee:** $149

‚Ä¢ **Monthly Platform Fee:** $85 (starting after activation)

This ensures we can activate your account and set you up for success.

**When you're ready, click Submit Payment Details to continue.**

data.name: reviewApplication
data.message:
Next, you‚Äôll review a summary of your application to confirm everything is correct.

Then, we‚Äôll guide you through signing your Independent Contractor Agreement (ICA) ‚Äî this formalizes your partnership with eXp Realty. Your signature is securely captured using Dropbox Sign, and you'll have a chance to review everything before signing.

Once signed, we‚Äôll move you into My eXp to complete two quick steps:

‚Ä¢ Set up Direct Deposit

‚Ä¢ Sign your W-9 Tax Form (also via Dropbox Sign)

Click "Review Application" to review and sign everything in one streamlined flow.
